text: fa'iidha nufikh almalak fi "aliqarna" nafkhat wahdatun, wahi alnafkhat al'uwlaa alty yakun eindaha halak alealima, wrufet al'ard waljibal ean 'amakiniha fkussirta, wduqqata diqatan wahidatan. fafi dhlk alhin qamat alqiamatu, wansadaeat alsama'a, fahi yawmayidh daeifat mustarkhiatun, la tmasuk fiha wala salabatan, walmalayikat ealaa jawanibiha wa'atrafiha, wayahmil earsh rabik fawqahum yawm alqiamat thmanytan min almalayikat aleizama. fi dhalik alyawm tuerdwn ealaa allha- 'ayuha alnaasa- lilhisab waljaza'i, la yakhfaa ealayh shay' min 'asrarikam
